entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 50
